Module: jcontroller/jcontroller

JController Module - for adding user defined controllers and interacting with the subcontrollers

Methods

(inner) addController(_name, _controllerObject)

Function used to add a controller to the app
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_name string the name of the controller
_controllerObject Object the user defined controller object

(inner) callController(_controllerName, _functionName)

Function to call a user specified controller
Parameters:
Name Type Description
_controllerName string name of the controller
_functionName string name of cotroller's function
